articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: Apple dives into display-making to cut reliance on Samsung - Nikkei Asia
articles.description: iPhone maker makes billion-dollar bet on micro-LED screens
articles.content: TAIPEI -- Apple is getting involved in the mass production of next-generation displays to lessen its reliance on rival Samsung and increase its own control over the supply of a key component, Nikkei … [+213 chars]
